an2.141:1.3: A gift of things of the flesh and a gift of the teaching.
an2.141:1.5: The better of these two gifts is the gift of the teaching.”
an2.142:1.3: An offering of things of the flesh and an offering of the teaching.
an2.142:1.5: The better of these two offerings is an offering of the teaching.”
an2.143:1.1: “There are these two acts of generosity.
an2.143:1.3: Generosity with things of the flesh and generosity with the teaching.
an2.143:1.4: These are the two acts of generosity.
an2.143:1.5: The better of these two acts of generosity is generosity with the teaching.”
an2.144:1.1: “There are these two kinds of charity.
an2.144:1.3: Charity in things of the flesh and charity in the teaching.
an2.144:1.4: These are the two kinds of charity.
an2.144:1.5: The better of these two kinds of charity is a charity in the teaching.”
an2.145:1.3: Riches in things of the flesh and riches in the teaching.
an2.145:1.5: The better of these two riches is riches in the teaching.”
an2.146:1.1: “There are these two kinds of enjoyment.
an2.146:1.3: Enjoyment of things of the flesh and enjoyment of the teaching.
an2.146:1.4: These are the two kinds of enjoyment.
an2.146:1.5: The better of these two kinds of enjoyment is the enjoyment of the teaching.”
an2.147:1.1: “There are these two kinds of sharing.
an2.147:1.3: Sharing things of the flesh and sharing the teaching.
an2.147:1.4: These are the two kinds of sharing.
an2.147:1.5: The better of these two kinds of sharing is sharing the teaching.”
an2.148:1.1: “There are these two kinds of inclusion.
an2.148:1.3: Inclusion in things of the flesh and inclusion in the teaching.
an2.148:1.4: These are the two kinds of inclusion.
an2.148:1.5: The better of these two kinds of inclusion is inclusion in the teaching.”
an2.149:1.1: “There are these two kinds of support.
an2.149:1.3: Support in things of the flesh and support in the teaching.
an2.149:1.4: These are the two kinds of support.
an2.149:1.5: The better of these two kinds of support is support in the teaching.”
an2.150:1.1: “There are these two kinds of sympathy.
an2.150:1.3: Sympathy in things of the flesh and sympathy in the teaching.
an2.150:1.4: These are the two kinds of sympathy.
an2.150:1.5: The better of these two kinds of sympathy is sympathy in the teaching.”
